synopsis.text: Asakura Kouichi, a dedicated designer at an advertising firm, finds himself at a crossroads after being unceremoniously removed from a project he had invested significant effort into. Seeking solace and inspiration, he retraces his steps to the Yokohama Museum of Art, a place that holds fond memories of his past encounter with a prodigious painter known as 'Eren.' Meanwhile, in the bustling city of New York, the gifted but troubled Eren, also known as 'The Southpaw,' struggles with the weight of her extraordinary talent. This sets the stage for an uplifting and thought-provoking drama about the trials and triumphs of creative professionals.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
